thread.title: For second day, Cosby team readies for attack on accusers

title: For second day, Cosby team readies for attack on accusers
text:
For second day, Cosby team readies for attack on accusers 3:13pm BST - 00:35 
Bill Cosby’s defense lawyers, led by attorney Thomas Mesereau will continue grilling Cosby's accusers on Thursday following withering treatment of three so far during his sexual assault trial . Rough Cut
